<h2>
  Coder demo using Coder
</h2>

<p>
  Make sure you load <a href="https://ace.c9.io/#nav=about" target="_blank">Ace</a> first.
</p>

<p>
  You can get it from <a href="https://github.com/ajaxorg/ace-builds/" target="_blank">ace-builds</a>.
</p>

<div id="coder-demo-ace"></div>

<link rel="stylesheet" href="../node_modules/skylark-ace/skins/default/ace.css">


<link href="../skins/default/coder.css" rel="stylesheet">
<script data-main="./js/bootstrap.js"  src="./js/require.js"></script>

<script>

function initPage(langx,$,Coder) {

  new Coder(document.querySelector('#coder-demo-ace'), {
    files: [
      {
        type: 'html',
        content: '<html>\n<body>\n<h1>Using CodeMirror</h1>\n</body>\n</html>'
      }
    ],
    pane: 'html',
    addons: {
      general : [
        'render'
      ],
      edit : [
        'ace'
      ]      
    }
  });
}

</script>
